attributes.action: Ban the use of the HRT drug Premarein on the grounds of cruelty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Premarein is got from in-foul mare's that are permanently tethered with cathers inserted to collect their "pre foul" urine.  Once born the fouls are killed and the mare is re-mated.  This is a barbaric and cruel operation that must be stopped.
